thread.title: Two major roads amongst the most dangerous in the UK (W)
thread.title_full: Two major roads amongst the most dangerous in the UK | West Country (W) - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Two major roads amongst the most dangerous in the UK (W)
text:
Two of the region's roads have been named among some of the most dangerous in the UK.
A report by the Road Safety Foundation rated both as high risk, with a significant number of serious or fatal crashes.
The A3124 was listed as a high risk road Credit: ITV News In Devon the A3124 between Torrington and Sampford Courtenay was listed as a "high risk road" by the Road Safety Foundation.
The ratings are based on the number of serious and fatal crashes Credit: ITV News Also with a significant number of serious or fatal crashes was the A3071 in Cornwall - that runs between Penzance and St Just.
Last updated Sun 27 Sep 2015 Travel Devon Cornwall and Isles of Scilly
